name: Escape the Tank!
description:
A small rules-light game about goldfish trying to escape from their fish tank. Inspired by Grant Howitt's Honey Heist and Pixar's Finding Nemo. Created for the One-Page RPG Jam 2021. A backside random table to help GMs come up with challenges and consequences is on the way after the jam, but the game is complete. 

(Small Note: this game does require a lot of creativity from the GM, but should still be easy to come up with challenges!)
